description: The construction of a new exterior rated sound attenuated generator, ATS, primary and secondary feeders.
full_summary:
### EZ899-231732A - Installation of a New Generator at the RCMP Nakusp Detachment

**Reference Number:** WS3861842081-Doc3861879309

**Publication Date:** February 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 23, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** April 4, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Description:**

This project entails the modification of the existing electrical distribution system and the replacement or addition of associated electrical equipment at the RCMP Nakusp Detachment. The scope of the project includes the general construction of a new exterior-rated sound-attenuated generator, Automatic Transfer Switch (ATS), primary, and secondary feeders.

**Procurement Method:**
This tender is issued as an Invitation to Qualify, with a procurement method of Competitive - Selective Tendering.

**Trade Agreements:**
This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Delivery:**
This project will be delivered within the country of Canada.

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

**Contact Information:**

* Wong, Summer (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (Note: No phone number provided)

**Notice URL and Attachments:**
No notice URL or attachments are available for this tender.

**Procurement Category:**
This project falls under the category of Construction - Electrical.

**Trade Agreements and Security Requirements:**
This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Application is closing soon, please make sure to review the requirements and submit your application before the deadline.

**Please note the deadline:** February 23, 2023. After this date, no applications will be accepted.
